title: I have question.
body: How do i avoid getting temporary banned when my Internet suddenly off while i am picking champion?

replies.body:
There isn't really a way to skirt around the low priority queues you might get placed in if your client keeps disconnecting in lobbies. Regardless of how the lobby or match is left (afk or d/c) it still counts as a leave.

The best way to try and avoid that is to make sure you're able to keep a steady connection with our game servers. Some easy ways of doing this is by trying an ethernet cord if possible, and doing a regular checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Test that out in a custom/practice game to see if you're good to go!
